A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Take note\, I am NOT a Star Wars fan. In fact\, I only got hooked because I found that I liked The Force Awakens and Rogue One. I was indifferent to both the Original Trilogy and the Prequel Trilogy. So I am not a disgruntled fanboy who was disappointed that my pet theories were not picked up. Rather\, I was a NEW fan who had only the highest hopes and optimism but was DISAPPOINTED by the final product. I had buyers remorse even though it was my brother who paid for the tickets.\n\nEnumerating the many disappointments would have been tedious. Just suffice to say\, I want to turn back the clock and just spend the time at home\, watching or reading something else--anything else!
